about_the_game:
This is a player's guide for the head well lost that includes:

  • information about the points system and variables of the game
  • a mostly spoiler-free guide that provides more general hints for unlocking each ending
  • a full walkthrough that serves as a detailed breakdown of each choice and shows when exactly each ending occurs and what's necessary to reach them
  • a guide to unlocking all of the special cat scenes

Two PDFs are provided with your purchase: a light mode PDF (black text on white bg) and a dark mode PDF (white text on dark gray bg). Text content-wise, they are the same.
